attributes.action: bring back capital punishment for life meaning life prisoners
attributes.additional_details: i would like to bring back capital punishment for life meaning life prisoners who have exhausted all appeals available to them, thus eleviating the possibility of an innocent person being punished. this would save the country money haveing to look after people for the rest of there lives and also stop killings in prison which these life prisoners often carry out as they know they are there for life, no deterant..
